Great torrent, everything is working fine. I do have one problem though. All of the decks are unlocked, haven't played this game before and would like to start right from scratch. Is there anyway to start from the beginning, with no decks unlocked?
To play with card unlocked. You have to have steam running. Just copy the Magic.exe crack over to your dir. and start the game. Saves work for me.

If you want to play at the beginning with no cards unlocked: After installation copy/replace the Magic.exe in your installed directory with the one in Skidrow folder, on the disc. only copy/replace the .exe, nothing else from the skirdrow folder. Then run Steam in Offline Mode click "Games" then "Add a Non-Steam Game to my Library" find and tick Magic the gathering dotp. then you can play through steam, in offline mode.

Good torrent. Good game. Well, it really feels better than the last Duels of the Planeswalker - though not better than the 2nd last, that old from way back when that played similar to Heroes of Might & Magic. ;)

You don't need to do jack except follow the instructions to the letter to get the unlocked cards.
Someone said to only copy the .exe crack to not have the unlocked cards. But why would you want that, really? I wasted much more time than I should have on the last DotP unlocking each decks' damn cards. I couldn't beat the other opponents with their unlocked decks if I hadn't my own.
If there were enough different matches to unlock all cards, then fine. But there aren't, you're forced to repeat matches.
Screw that, SKIDROW was right to crack-unlock. Kudos to them.

Only one problem I've had: freezing. It's happened twice now, freezing when the AI opponent is one of his phases and processing what to do. First time was negligible; a bad precedent, but I was gonna lose anyway (Tezzeret's deck is annoyingly efficient); but 2nd time around, just now, I was winning, had him already 1 and myself at 18 even if I did lose all my creatures. Lotsa lands, though... I had him. And it froze. Bah!
Hopefully, it only happens with Tezzeret. But... fat chance.

"AppId Error" "No Steam" FIX

This worked for me, I hope it works for y'all. If you are running Windows 7 64bit, and were unable to download the Windows Redistributable 2008, this may be your issue. As it was for me. The "vcredist.exe" installer included with the game is only compatible with a 32 bit system. So...

http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=2092

Download this and it should work. Good Luck! Let me know y'alls results.

As for the "X3DAudio1_7.dll is missing"...

This is an issue with DirectX. Although I already had DirectX installed, I was unable to use the installer included in the ISO. I can only assume my Windows 7 64bit was not compatibility with it either. Be sure to Google a DirectX installer so you can run this game.

Any other issues should just be your inability to install/crack properly. Have fun :)
This game is awesome. It needs DLC immediately. 16 decks is not enough.

TO RESET YOUR DATA:

1. Show hidden files
2. C:\users\YourName\AppData\Local\Skidrow\49470\
  (C:\documents and..\AppData...  for XP)
3. Delete the file you see inside.

Other folders in \Skidrow are for other skidrow games from Steam so be careful.

Error_Wad_Corrupt Fix:
After install two folders were shown in Wizards of the Coast LLC: copy all files from "Magic the Gathering DOTP 2012" into "Magic the Gathering - Duels of the Planewalkers". Along with crack from skidrow folder. should be gtg.
Death_from_below: The crack folder will be on the "cd" once you have extracted the files and mounted them with daemon tools. Same place as the install file; name of crack folder is Skidrow.

For anyone who wants to change their name from "SKIDROW" to whatever else, here's how to do it:

After copying the contents from the SKIDROW folder you will see a "Skidrow.ini" file.

Open the file and at the bottom where it says PlayerName = ""   just put whatever you want within the quotes.
